meta.description: Pet parents have a right to be concerned about the lifelong costs associated with unnecessary vaccine protocols.

title: Pet Vaccinations
cleaned_text: The term “anti-vaxxer” has made its way into the pet parent population, and is a term used to describe pet owners who don’t believe in or agree with providing baseline, protective immunity through vaccination; unfortunately, the media and uneducated veterinarians erroneously lump wise vaxxers and anti-vaxxers together, despite these two groups of pet owners having very different beliefs

opengraph.title: Pet Vaccinations
opengraph.description: Pet parents have a right to be concerned about the lifelong costs associated with unnecessary vaccine protocols.
